001/**
002 * Representations for all the valid command words for the game
003 * along with a description string.
004 * 
005 * @author Pierre MATAR
006 * @version 2006.03.30
007 */
008public enum CommandWord
009{
010    // A value for each command word along with its
011    // corresponding user interface string.
012    GO("go"), QUIT("quit"), HELP("help"), LOOK("look"), EAT("eat"), BACK("back"), TEST("test"), TAKE("take"), DROP("drop"), ITEMS("items"), UNKNOWN("?"), FIX("fix");
013    
014    
015    // The command string.
016    private String aCommandString;
017    
018    /**
019     * Initialise with the corresponding command word.
020     * @param commandWord The command string.
021     */
022    CommandWord(String pCommandString)
023    {
024        this.aCommandString = pCommandString;
025    }
026    
027    /**
028     * @return The command word as a string.
029     */
030    public String getDescription()
031    {
032        return this.aCommandString;
033    }
034}
